titles.title: I'm A Miracle; I'm A Vessel Of Light

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm a miracle; I'm a vessel of light
A king, and priest, a star in the night.
I'm a heritage to the family of God,
A living legacy of Christ.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am the will; I am the will of God.
I am the will; I am the will of God.
With every breath and beat of my heart.
I am the will of God; I am the will of God.
